item.title: How do you change rotation of npc's?
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

riku9182:

Um i think that it is VERY VERY complicated.

No, it’s actually really easy…

In your npchandler class search for “public void newNPC”

At the end of that method, add this;

if (newNPC.npcType == ID) { if ((newNPC.absX == NPCX) && (newNPC.absY == NPCY)) { newNPC.TurnNPCTo(newNPC.absX +1, newNPC.absY); } }

The +1 after absX is the rotation, here is a list;

North = I’m not sure… Try figure it out for yourself.
East = +1
South = +0
West = -1
